items.name: Piano
items.description: The pinnacle of Edea's professional line, the Piano boot represents the ultimate fusion of innovation and craftsmanship. Featuring premium microfiber construction with strategic leather reinforcement, it delivers unprecedented stability for quad jumps while maintaining exceptional lightness. Its anatomically engineered shape provides superior ankle support and perfect weight distribution for optimal control during technical elements.

items.name: Ice Fly
items.description: Trusted by elite competitors worldwide, the Ice Fly combines advanced thermal regulation with precision support. Its innovative dual-density construction adapts to your foot's natural movement while maintaining rigid support where needed. The boot's specialized moisture-wicking lining and anatomical padding ensure maximum comfort during intense training sessions.

items.name: Concerto
items.description: Designed for advancing competitive skaters, the Concerto offers an ideal balance of flexibility and support. Its progressive flex pattern accommodates double jumps while providing the stability needed for complex spin positions. The boot features Edea's signature anatomical heel lock and reinforced ankle support system.

items.name: Chorus
items.description: Perfect for dedicated intermediate skaters, the Chorus delivers reliable performance with enhanced comfort. The boot's semi-rigid structure provides excellent support for single and double jumps, while its memory foam padding system ensures a custom-like fit. Features quick-dry moisture management and anti-bacterial treatment.

items.name: Flamenco Ice
items.description: The Flamenco Ice combines style with functionality for recreational and beginning competitive skaters. Its moderately firm support system helps maintain proper alignment during basic jumps and spins. The boot's streamlined design includes extra padding in key pressure points and a breathable liner for extended comfort.

items.name: Overture
items.description: An excellent entry point into quality figure skating boots, the Overture provides essential support for developing fundamentals. Its flexible yet supportive structure helps beginners maintain proper form while learning basic techniques. Features include extra ankle padding and a user-friendly lacing system ideal for young skaters.

items.name: Royal Prime White
items.description: The Royal Prime in classic white exemplifies Italian craftsmanship with modern performance features. Its advanced composite construction provides excellent response for competitive elements while maintaining optimal temperature regulation. The anatomical last ensures precise fit with special attention to arch support and heel lock.

items.name: Royal Prime Black
items.description: The sophisticated black variant of the Royal Prime adds elegance to technical excellence. Features include a high-density ankle support system, premium moisture-wicking liner, and Risport's exclusive heel lock technology. The boot's reinforced structure excels in maintaining stability during complex jumping combinations.

items.name: Rotation
items.description: Engineered for elite performance, the Rotation blade features precision-crafted stainless steel with optimal weight distribution. The innovative rocker profile enhances edge control and spin velocity, while the specialized serration pattern provides superior grip during takeoffs. Generous sweet spot allows for confident edge work and stable landings.

items.name: E-Guards
items.description: Premium blade protection featuring high-density rubber compound with reinforced toe and heel sections. The ergonomic design ensures easy application while providing complete blade coverage. Anti-slip texture prevents walking accidents and includes ventilation channels to prevent moisture buildup.

items.name: Gloves
items.description: Professional-grade skating gloves combining thermal insulation with tactile sensitivity. Features reinforced palms for spin positions, touchscreen-compatible fingertips, and elastic wrist bands for secure fit. The breathable membrane maintains optimal hand temperature while preventing moisture accumulation.

items.name: Jacquard
items.description: Premium skate bag featuring durable jacquard fabric with waterproof coating. Includes separate compartments for boots and accessories, ventilated blade storage, and padded shoulder strap. The specialized design incorporates quick-access pockets and protective reinforcement in high-wear areas.
